title: Anima
description: Animaâ€™s goal is to create a continuous design-to-code process. As designers and developers ourselves, we understand that by streamlining the handoff process, teams will deliver and innovate 10x faster. The effort behind this powerhouse is huge, and the result is advanced prototyping features and the ability to translate designs into HTML, React, and Vue code, all from Figma, Adobe XD & Sketch.
